title: Postcode lottery for new cancer treatments, doctors warn
description: Experts say bureaucracy is "stifling innovation" and that applying for funding to pay for new treatments can be "cumbersome".
content:

Senior cancer doctors are warning that excessive red tape means some patients in England are struggling to access the latest cancer treatments.

title: Stress and how to manage it: Dr Xand van Tulleken's five key tips
description: Stress, in small doses, can be good for us. Here are five simple, science-backed ways to manage it better.
content:
Summer's over, the holidays feel like a distant memory and suddenly the world is back at full speed.
And that back-to-it energy can leave many of us feeling stretched thin.

title: 'I'm still keeping rubbish in the hallway'
description: The BBC speaks to people in Birmingham to mark six months of the city's all-out bin dispute.

title: 'Harry's tea with the King' and 'Mandelson on brink'
description: Prince Harry and King Charles met in London for the first time in 19 months.
content: Two men feature prominently on many of the front pages on Thursday. The first is Lord Mandelson, under increasing pressure over his friendship with Jeffrey Epstein. "Now Mandelson must be fired" is the main headline in the Daily Mail, external, which... [1912 chars]

title: Mothers and staff tell of global charity's role in child disappearances under Assad regime
description: The Assad regime used an international charity to hide children of detainees from their families.
content:
Reem al-Kari and her cousin Lama are searching through dozens of photos of children spread out on a desk. Lama thinks she spots one with a likeness to Karim, Reem's missing son.
Karim was two-and-a-half when he and his father disappeared, in 2013 dur... [10175 chars]
